input.sentences: what a fabulous day with my wonderful man .
he has worked long and hard to get through graduate school and i could n't be more proud .
now that he has accomplished his education goals | we can move on with the rest of our lives and get married .
a big congratulations to my sweetheart and all of his friends ! !
output.sentences: My girl and I had a wonderful fabulous day.
I finally graduated from seminary school.
She was proud that I finished school.
We finally could rest and get ready to move after we got married.
I took a sweet picture with my friends and congratulated them.
